title: Post Prime Day, Dyson Clears Stock of SuperSonic Hair Dryer with a Massive Discount
description: Did you think Dyson was out of reach?
author: Gizmodo Deals
excerpt: Did you think Dyson was out of reach?
text: Amazon has unveiled an great post Prime Day deal on the very popular Dyson Supersonic hair dryer and makes it accessible to everyone, not just Prime members. This rare opportunity to purchase one of Dyson’s premium hair care products at a significant discount is truly noteworthy as the brand seldom offers promotions on its hair styling tools. The Dyson Supersonic was originally priced at $429 but it is now available for just $329 which represents a massive $100 savings. This 23% discount marks the lowest price ever seen for this revolutionary hair dryer. See at Amazon Salon-quality results Engineered for fast drying and precision styling, the Dyson Supersonic is designed to protect hair from extreme heat damage while delivering salon-quality results. Its intelligent heat control system measures air temperature over 40 times per second (!!) and prevents excessive heat exposure. The powerful digital motor V9 ensures rapid drying while the Air Multiplier technology produces a high-pressure and high-velocity jet of controlled air for precise styling. The Dyson Supersonic comes with five attachments so that users can cater to various hair types and styles, from straight to coily. The latest addition, the Flyaway attachment, promises to tame flyaways in a single pass and delivers a smooth and shiny finish typically achievable only in professional settings. Users of the Supersonic hair drayer report impressive results including increased smoothness by 75%, enhanced shine by up to 132% and a reduction in frizz and flyaways by up to 61%. The ergonomic design of the Supersonic is another key selling point. Unlike traditional hair dryers, the Dyson model is engineered to be perfectly balanced in the hand to reduce arm fatigue during use. Its unique design with the motor in the handle also contributes to a quieter drying experience compared to conventional dryers. Fantastic price tag While the $329 price tag may still seem steep for a hair dryer (it is), it’s essential to consider the long-term benefits and durability of the Dyson Supersonic. This device can last for years and it a worthwhile investment in their daily hair care routine. It can also save money by reducing the frequency of professional salon visits. For those who have been eyeing the Dyson Supersonic but were deterred by its usual premium price, this post Prime Day offer is a good opportunity to move forward. Whether you’re a hair care professional looking to upgrade your tools or someone who simply wants to elevate their at-home styling game, this deal is too good to pass up. See at Amazon
